file_insights.changes_summary: Added aria-label and aria-haspopup attributes to IDE buttons

patterns_discovered: Consistent button styling with variant, size, and className
IDE opening functionality through onClick handlers
gotchas_discovered: Buttons were previously lacking screen reader context
Missing accessibility attributes for dropdown and button elements

approach_outcome.description: Added aria-labels to IDE buttons for improved screen reader support

recommendations: Continue adding aria-labels to interactive elements
Review other components for similar accessibility improvements
Consider automated accessibility testing for future development
